ml:Announcement.ml:title: MarkLogic to Sponsor WindyCityDB and Participate in All-day Lab
ml:Announcement.ml:author: Cleo Haynal
Eric Bloch

ml:teaser.p: Come to the Windy City on June 26th and learn more about MarkLogic at the Illinois Institute of Technology, McCormick Tribune Campus Center.

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: Windy City

ml:body.p: This is a gathering for all who are interested in NoSQL databases. You can learn more about the event at http://windycitydb.org/

As part of the conference's all-day lab, MarkLogic is making available a copy of MarkLogic Server loaded with the conference sample dataset. You will be able to access database via ActiveDocument, an open-source Ruby interface to document databases. Come join us, grab a badge, see what it's like to interact with a NoSQL solution that has integrated full-text search, and learn more about how MarkLogic was NoSQL before NoSQL was cool.
